data.name: AccountActivated
data.value: Congratulations, your account has been activated successfully, you can now login to your account.

data.name: AccountActivationFailure
data.value: Sorry, we are not able to activate your account right now, Please try again later, If the problem still present please dont hesitate to contact us.

data.name: CantInsertArticle
data.value: Sorry, but you can not add more than 2 articles within 30 days!

data.name: ChangePWFailed
data.value: Sorry, the password did not change, please try again later

data.name: ConfirmDelete
data.value: The record has been deleted successfully...

data.name: ConfirmInsert
data.value: The new record has been added successfully...

data.name: ConfirmUpdate
data.value: The record has been updated successfully...

data.name: CreateUserSucceeded
data.value: Your account has been created successfully, an e-mail was sent to you to activate your account, Thank you for Subscribing with Fantaka

data.name: EmptyDataMessage
data.value: Sorry, No Available Data at the moment...

data.name: GeneralMessage
data.value: The action has been done successfully

data.name: NewsletterSubscribeMessage
data.value: To receive the latest news of the current sport and country on your e-mail, please select the language you prefer then press "Subscribe" button.

data.name: NewsletterUserHasSubscribed
data.value: You have already subscribed before in the newsletter service for the current country and sport, to subscribe for different country and/or sport please change the country and/or the sport and try again.

data.name: NoActivePolls
data.value: Sorry, But No Polls Currently Activated...

data.name: PollLogin
data.value: Please login first to be able to vote !

data.name: PreConfirmActivate
data.value: Are you sure you want to activate this item ?

data.name: PreConfirmApprove
data.value: Are you sure you want to publish this record ?

data.name: PreConfirmBlocking
data.value: Are you sure you want to block this user ?

data.name: PreConfirmDeactivate
data.value: Are you sure you want to deactivate this item ?

data.name: PreConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this record ?

data.name: PreConfirmReject
data.value: Are you sure you want to reject this record ?

data.name: PreConfirmSettingCurrent
data.value: Are you sure you want to set this as current ?

data.name: PWChanged
data.value: Your password has been changed successfuly

data.name: PWRecovered
data.value: Your password has been reset and sent to your e-mail

data.name: PWRecoveryFailed
data.value: Sorry, no password is recovered please try again later

data.name: RefreshRssNews
data.value: News provided from RSS are updated automatically on daily bases, however to refresh news provided from RSS manually please press “Refresh”!

data.name: RequireLogin
data.value: Sorry, this page is for registered users only, please login first or if you are a new user to register

data.name: requireLoginToComment
data.value: Please login first to be able to add a new comment !

data.name: RssNewsRefreshed
data.value: The news provided from RSS has been updated successfully

data.name: SettedCurrent
data.value: The recored has been setted as current successfully

data.name: SubscribedSuccessfully
data.value: Your subscription has been registered successfully.

data.value: Please login first to be able to vote!

data.value: This question has no answers yet

data.name: TopNewsMin
data.value: The system will set the latest 4 news to be the Top News !
